name: Faketangle
description:
FULL SCREEN GAME TO PLAY

This game is made for the Brackeys Game Jam.

You can kill enemies by clicking the left mouse button - that creates a stick with which you can kill the enemies for a few seconds. But be careful there is a cooldown.

In this game, you try to dodge and kill square enemies, but you don't see them, you only see their reflections. You can click space to see all the current enemies, but you can use this only 3 times, but every 5 kills you get another one.

I hope you like this game and good luck with it.
